short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make the tabs of a repository stay at the top of the page when scrolling.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This add-on will pin the new Github navigation bar in a repository view to the top of the screen as you scroll down.

This keeps the tabs easy for navigation between code/issues/pull requests/and etc no matter how far down the page you go.
